results.prompt:
You are a PDDL planning expert. Solve the following problem based on the provided domain.

DOMAIN:
(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object
	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

PROBLEM:

 (:domain spanner)

    )

	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

You are a PDDL planning expert. Solve the following problem based on the provided domain.

DOMAIN:
(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object
	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)
